trans-unit.source: The ListChildrenAccessRule class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to list child objects.
trans-unit.target: ListChildrenAccessRule 类表示特定类型的用于允许或拒绝该权限授予列表子对象的 Active Directory 域服务对象的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref>使用指定的标识引用和访问控制类型的类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>指定访问规则类型的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref>使用指定的标识引用、 访问控制类型和 Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息的类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>指定访问规则类型的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref>指定访问规则的继承类型的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ListChildrenAccessRule"></xref>使用指定的标识引用、 访问控制类型、 Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息和继承的对象类型的类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>指定访问规则类型的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref>指定访问规则的继承类型的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
trans-unit.target: 架构可以继承此访问规则的子对象类型的 GUID。
